products.title: Product Categories
products.subtitle: Complete Lighting Solutions
products.description: From outdoor environments to industrial facilities, our comprehensive range of LED lighting solutions delivers performance, efficiency, and reliability.
products.solarLightingDesc: Sustainable solar-powered lighting for streets, pathways, and public spaces.
products.energyStorageDesc: Advanced battery solutions for reliable energy storage and power management.
products.outdoorLedDesc: Professional-grade LED fixtures designed for outdoor environments.
products.industrialDesc: High-performance lighting solutions for industrial facilities.

company.title: About TedLighting
company.subtitle: Manufacturer Focus, Not a Trading Story
company.description: TedLighting is a professional solar-powered street light manufacturer with high quality and ten years of experience. We control the entire production process—from component sourcing to final assembly.

features.cbDesc: World's first high-power integrated solar street light with CB IECEE Saber certification.
features.isoDesc: All raw materials are 100% tested. 3-day aging inspection before shipping.
features.designDesc: Global unique patent design. German Red Dot Award winner.
features.lifespanDesc: Real lifespan for government projects, not marketing claims.

trustBadges.yearsDesc: Thousands of installations across the globe have equipped our team with unmatched expertise that serves every project.
trustBadges.tailoredDesc: We collaborate closely with every client, designing custom solutions and providing dedicated consultation from start to finish.
trustBadges.componentsDesc: Our partnerships with Tier 1 manufacturers provides customers with state-of-the-art components that deliver quality, long-lasting light.
trustBadges.warrantyDesc: We offer up to a 10-year, full-product warranty on our systems, giving you total peace of mind.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Let's discuss your project
contact.description: Whether you're planning a new installation or upgrading existing infrastructure, our team is ready to help you find the perfect lighting solution.
contact.description2: Tell us about your project requirements. Our technical team will provide a customized solution and competitive quotation within 24 hours.
contact.projectPlaceholder: Tell us about your project requirements, specifications, or any questions...
contact.responseTime: We typically respond within 24 hours on business days.

cta.title: Get Started
cta.subtitle: Check If Our Solution Fits Your Project
cta.description: Tell us your location, application, and required operating hours. We'll recommend a configuration that works in real conditions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Are you a manufacturer or a trading company?
faq.a1: We are a direct manufacturer with in-house production, testing, and quality control.
faq.a2: We supply distributors, EPC contractors, and government project buyers.
faq.a3: Our products are deployed across Southeast Asia, Africa, the Middle East, and Latin America.
faq.a4: Yes. System configurations are adjusted based on location, usage profile, and project requirements.
faq.q5: How do I get a quotation?
faq.a5: Submit your project details or application requirements, and our team will recommend a suitable configuration.

footer.description: Professional solar and LED lighting manufacturer with 15+ years of engineering excellence. Trusted by projects in 160+ countries.

testimonials.title: What Our Partners Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real results from our global partners
